report.title: Reference output basic
report.description: Basic output of a reference range calculation for a range of static bat detector record nights.
report.query: select fullset.id, fullset.date_start as date, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, cttl.default_common_name as common_name, fullset.entered_sref, fullset.passes, round(fullset.percentile*100) as percentile from ( select import_guid, id, date_start, taxa_taxon_list_id, entered_sref, passes, percent_rank() over (order by passes) as percentile from ecobat_occurrences o where 1=1 #filters# ) as fullset join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=fullset.taxa_taxon_list_id where fullset.import_guid='#input_import_guid#'

param.name: filter_spatial_km
param.description: Number of km of radius to limit the reference set to.

param.name: filter_date
param.description: Limit to records +/- 30 days of the input

param.name: filter_temp
param.description: Limit to records +/- 2deg of the input

param.name: filter_wind
param.description: Limit to records +/- 2mph of the input

param.name: input_doy_from
param.description: First day of year (0-364/5) in the imported records list to compare against

param.name: input_doy_to
param.description: Last day of year (0-364/5) in the imported records list to compare against

param.name: input_x
param.description: Average easting value being fed into the analysis

param.name: input_y
param.description: Average northing value being fed into the analysis

param.name: input_temp_low
param.description: Lowest temperature at sunset for range of records being input into the report in degC

param.name: input_temp_high
param.description: Highest temperature at sunset for range of records being input into the report in degC

param.name: input_wind_low
param.description: Lowest wind speed at sunset for range of records being input into the report in mph

param.name: input_wind_high
param.description: Highest wind speed at sunset for range of records being input into the report in mph
